items.summary: Add a photo gallery section to the apology page that displays the 8 uploaded user photos (Snapchat-1302406921.jpg, Snapchat-818160405.jpg, Snapchat-1302406921-1.jpg, Snapchat-818160405-1.jpg, Snapchat-818160405-2.jpg, Snapchat-1302406921-2.jpg, Snapchat-1302406921-3.jpg, Snapchat-818160405-3.jpg) in an elegant layout that complements the existing emotional theme

Display the message 'forever yours with love bablet' prominently on the apology page in a position that feels intimate and personal, using typography that matches the emotional tone of the existing content
